title: Mommy Dead and Dearest
description:
Tig and Cheryl take on "Mommy Dead and Dearest," a true crime doc about a seriously dysfunctional mother/daughter dynamic. Tig does her best Cajun accent, Cheryl ponders McDonald's etiquette, and much more, on another must-listen episode of True Story! *this episode spills beans* Buy merch at podswag.com/truestory! (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
